review: Was very easy to hook up. Works great, we added Amazon Prime & Netflix for very little money. Would recommend to anyone who gets tired of same shows different day on TV.
author: Cora RObbins

review: I love my Fure TV Stick. No matter where I go I have access to my prime TV and movies.
author: NikkC

review: Very nice.  Wireless works great.  Watching Band of Brothers on HBO from Amazon Prime.  Can't beat that Sobel.
author: Benjamin A. Salzman

review: I love it. It makes my prime instant video super.
author: Delay998 "Delay998"

review: Very pleased that able to watch the Canadian Brier curling event live.
author: Warren Barclay

review: We love this product.  It streams very quickly and gives us access to lots of great stuff.  I came already setup for my account and was easy to use once I figured out the remote which would have been easier if I had read the instruction booklet.
author: W. Bombard "WNB"
